title: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
notes: Runs slower than native. Online works. Game might crash upon changing graphic options.

title: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
notes: Proton update of August 22 broke the game. The game now gets stuck when loading the main city hub.

title: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
notes: Add "-windowed" to launch options or you'll get a black screen crash. Alt-tabbing prevents you from moving. Performance and stability are both perfect.

title: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
notes: EAC doesn't run, however the game DOES let you join the online city hub. The game freezes instantly when trying to battle another player (probably due the lack of EAC). Besides that, all other features work correctly (Quests, Battles, Cutscenes, Story Mode, Hero Colosseum) Performance is about the same of the Windows counterpart. Game crashed once when I took Cooler instructor lessons, but I couldn't replicate the crash again, it worked after I took the quest again.
Everything Works, have not tried Versus however
